brand_identity.name: AYA Regulars Manager
brand_identity.description: A rhythm-focused, monochrome attendance and pass tracking system for dance communities.
brand_identity.aesthetic: Strict Monochrome, High Contrast, Kinetic Typography, Negative Space

headings.name: Syne
headings.usage: Use for all H1-H3 headings. Tight tracking for heavy weights.

body.name: Plus Jakarta Sans
body.usage: Use for all body text, UI labels, and data tables. Excellent readability.

styles.h1: font-heading text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold tracking-tight leading-none
styles.caption: font-body text-xs uppercase tracking-widest font-semibold text-muted-foreground/70

rules: STRICTLY NO COLORS: Do not use blue, green, red, etc. Even for errors/success, use Black/White iconography and patterns.
Success State: Solid Black Circle with White Check (Light Mode) / White Circle with Black Check (Dark Mode).
Error State: Outlined Circle with thick stroke + Strikethrough or 'X'.
Gradients: None. Use solid fills or 1px borders.
Opacity: Use opacity heavily for hierarchy (e.g., text-black/60 for secondary text).

mobile_first_rules: Touch Targets: All interactive elements MUST be at least 48px height.
Bottom Action Bar: For primary actions on mobile (e.g., Save Attendance), use a sticky bottom bar.
Thumb Zone: Keep frequent actions (Mark Present) in the lower 50% of the screen.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-12 px-8 rounded-full font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-12 px-8 rounded-full font-medium
buttons.icon_large: h-14 w-14 rounded-full border-2 border-primary flex items-center justify-center transition-all active:scale-90

cards.default: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-2xl border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-300
cards.interactive: bg-card hover:bg-accent/50 cursor-pointer rounded-2xl border border-border transition-all hover:border-primary/20
cards.attendance_card: flex items-center justify-between p-4 border-b border-border last:border-0

inputs.default: flex h-12 w-full rounded-xl border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-base shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

badges.default: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border border-border px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2 text-foreground

images.usage: Login page background (with overlay), Hero sections
Subtle background texture for cards or sidebars

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px or 2px. Sharp or slightly rounded joins.

attendance_marking.interaction: Single tap to toggle status. Avoid dropdowns for status if possible.
attendance_marking.visuals: Use big circular toggles. Empty circle = Absent. Filled Check = Present. Filled Cross = Excused (if needed).
attendance_marking.layout: List view with avatar on left, name in middle, big toggle on right.

admin_dashboard.charts: Use 'Recharts' with monochrome patterns (stripes, dots) or simple grayscale bars to differentiate data sets without color.

pass_management.visuals: Ticket/Coupon style layout for Passes. Use dashed borders for separation.

general: NO COLOR PERMITTED. Use Black, White, and Gray scale only.
motion: Use `framer-motion` for page transitions and list entry animations.
Micro-interactions: Buttons should scale down slightly on press (`active:scale-95`).
Ripple effect on tap for mobile feel.
accessibility: Do not rely on color to convey meaning (use text labels or icons in addition to 'color' changes, though here 'color' is just shade of gray).

instructions_to_main_agent: Use the provided image URLs for placeholders and backgrounds.
Implement the font definitions in `index.css` or `layout.tsx` (via Google Fonts import).
Strictly follow the Mobile-First approach for Instructor views.
